Graded Assault.name: Graded Assault
Graded Assault.flavor: Your strike sends the enemy reeling, and it opens the way for a series of attacks from your comrades.
Graded Assault.onHit: Deal your Strength modifier in damage. Until the start of your next turn, the target is dazed, and any ally within 5 squares of you who attacks the target with an at-will attack power can determine his or her attack result as if the result of the roll was a 10, instead of rolling the die.

Unification Stance.name: Unification Stance
Unification Stance.flavor: Your very presence, symbolizing the unity of your allies, aids in their recovery.
Unification Stance.effect: Until the stance ends, at the end of each of your turns, each ally within 5 squares of you can make a saving throw.

Diplomacy of Steel.name: Diplomacy of Steel
Diplomacy of Steel.flavor: Each of your movements buttresses the impression of overwhelming force and perfect coordination among your allies.
Diplomacy of Steel.attack: Strength vs. Will. Gain a bonus to the attack roll equal to the number of allies within 2 squares of you (maximum bonus of +4).
Diplomacy of Steel.effect: After the first attack, you can make a melee basic attack against the target. If the first attack reduced the target to 0 hit points, you instead gain temporary hit points equal to 10 + your Intelligence modifier, and then you can shift 2 squares and make a melee basic attack against another target.
